Python資料型態

| Type                     | Description      |
|--------------------------|------------------|
| int                      | 1                |
| float                    | 2.3              |
| str                      | 'hello'          |
| list (ordered)           | \[1, 'hello'\]   |
| dict (unordered)         | {'key': 'value'} |
| tup (ordered, immutable) | (1, 'hello')     |
| set (unordered, unique)  | {1, 'hello'}     |
| bool                     | True or False    |
